title: Teammates making you feel like they are hopeless and terrible?
body:
Play a bot game, and just... WATCH your teammates. Obviously it isn't every game... but I just had a tryn on my team go 1 and 11, and the one was a mercy kill I let him have... which almost got away...

you think your norm team was bad? about 30-50% of people playing bots will make you praise your team simply because they aren't that bad... and these aren't new players... all have lvl 30 accts....
